alert.note: Alert for Inland Brazoria; Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 11:56PM CST until February 04 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, dangerous road conditions from ice are occurring.. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 13 degrees. * WHERE...Northern Liberty and Inland Brazoria Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Though precipitation has come to an end, roads are still wet and freezing rapidly as temperatures plunge after an arctic cold front.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For more information from the National Weather Service visit https://weather.gov/houston For the latest road conditions for Texas visit https://drivetexas.org
